extras.value: {     "schema_descriptor_version": 0.1,     "resource_type": "csv-observations-collection",      "description": "Hourly precipitation is given as sum of the six 10min intervals. For instance, the value for UTC 11 contains the precipitation from UTC 9:51-UTC 10:50.",     "members": [{         "resource_name": ["da52b359-3be0-40a8-a760-90aca720bfbc"],         "resource_type": "platforms",         "fields": [{             "field_id": "Stations_id",              "short_name": "station ID",             "long_name": "Station identifier",             "description": "The Identifier for the station declared by the German weather service (DWD)",             "field_type": "Integer"         }, {             "field_id": "von_datum",              "short_name": "start date",             "long_name": "Starting date",             "description": "Date for the first available observations",             "field_type": "Date",             "date_format": "YYYYMMDD"         }, {             "field_id": "bis_datum",              "short_name": "last date",             "long_name": "Last date",             "description": "Date for the last available observations",             "field_type": "Date",             "date_format": "YYYYMMDD"         }, {             "field_id": "Stationshoehe",              "short_name": "altitude",             "long_name": "Altitude",             "description": "The Altitude of the station above sea level",             "phenomenon": "altitude",             "uom": "m",             "field_type": "Integer"         }, {             "field_id": "geoBreite",              "short_name": "lat",             "long_name": "Latitude",             "description": "The latitude position of the station",             "uom": "decimal degrees",             "field_type": "Float"         }, {             "field_id": "geoLaenge",              "short_name": "lon",             "long_name": "longitude",             "description": "The longitude position of the station",             "uom": "decimal degrees",             "field_type": "Float"         }, {             "field_id": "Stationsname",              "short_name": "station name",             "long_name": "station name",             "description": "The official name of the station",             "field_type": "String"         }, {             "field_id": "Bundesland",              "short_name": "state",             "long_name": "federal state",             "description": "The federal state",             "field_type": "String"         }]     }, {         "resource_name": ["c33214db-b9a4-4509-af8e-0f4d3dc4a26b", "692b5f79-d99c-43ee-baf6-ff532b9ea3ca", "09c14962-8a83-442f-ab52-17041af18518", "a5a4ef50-0cd9-41b2-8d1c-a2ab74b7d5df"],         "resource_type": "observations",         "fields": [{             "field_id": "STATIONS_ID",              "short_name": "station identifier",             "long_name": "station identification number",             "description": "The station identification number",             "field_type": "Integer"         }, {             "field_id": "MESS_DATUM",             "short_name": "measurement data",             "long_name": "measurement data",             "description": "The date of the measurement",             "field_type": "Date",             "date_format": "YYYYMMDDhh"         }, {             "field_id": "QUALITAETS_NIVEAU",              "short_name": "quality niveau",             "long_name": "the quality niveau",             "description": "Describes the method of quality control, with which erroneous or suspicious values are identified and set to -999: 1 - only formal control; 2- controlled with individually defined criteria; 3 - automatic control and correction; 5 - historic, subjective procedures; 7 - second control done, before correction; 8 - quality control outside ROUTINE; 9 - not all parameters corrected; 10 - quality control finished, all corrections finished",             "field_type": "Integer"         }, {             "field_id": "NIEDERSCHLAG_GEFALLEN_IND",              "short_name": "precipitation index",             "long_name": "precipitation index",             "description": "the precipitation index. Possible values: 0 - no precipitation; 1 - some precipitation",             "field_type": "Integer"         }, {             "field_id": "NIEDERSCHLAGSHOEHE",              "short_name": "precipitaton height",             "long_name": "precipitaton height",             "description": "the precipitaton height",             "no_data": "-999",             "phenomenon": "precipitation height",             "uom": "mm",             "field_type": "Float"         }, {             "field_id": "NIEDESCHLAGSFORM",              "short_name": "precipitation type",             "long_name": "precipitation type W_R",             "description": "Is given only at certain times, in accordance with SYNOP definition. Refer to daily values for more information on precipitation type. The classification of precipitation type in the daily values differs from the classification for the hourly values. For the hourly values, the W_R definition is used: 0- no fallen precipitation or too little deposition (e.g., dew or, frost) to form a precipitation height larger than 0.0; 1 - precipitation height only due to deposition (dew or frost) or if it cannot decided how large the part from deposition is; 2 - precipitation height only due to liquid deposition; 3 -precipitation height only due to solid precipitation; 6 - precipitation height due to fallen liquid precipitation, may also include deposition of any kind; 7 - precipitation height due to fallen solid precipitation, may also include deposition of any kind; 8 - fallen precipitation in liquid and solid form; 9 - no precipitation measurement or form of precipitation cannot be determined.",             "no_data": "-999",             "field_type": "Integer"         }]     }] }

groups.description: All informations about Dresden and surroundings

name: precipitation-dwd
notes: Precipitation data provided of the German Weather Service (DWD)
title: Precipitation

organization.description: Der Deutsche Wetterdienst (DWD) mit seiner Zentrale in Offenbach am Main ist der nationale meteorologische Dienst der Bundesrepublik Deutschland. Er erbringt meteorologische Dienstleistungen (Wettervorhersage) für die Allgemeinheit oder einzelne Nutzer, wie zum Beispiel die Schifffahrt, die Landwirtschaft oder die Wissenschaft, und betreibt darüber hinaus den Informationsverbund der Bundesverwaltung (IVBV). [siehe Wikipedia](https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deutscher_Wetterdienst)
organization.name: dwd
organization.title: DWD
